transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Ji sir, bataiye company name kya hai?
Customer: Sir lead wait ka likhwana hai do hafte ho gaye hai kuch IndiaMART pe lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha accha mujhe ek baar sir company name bataiyega.
Customer: Malik Enterprises.
Executive: Accha accha okay.
Customer: Ji do hafte se problem aa rahi hai sir ye?
Executive: Do hafte se nahi madam sir jab se ye export ka package liya hai sir tab se dikkat me hai samajhiye India ka bhi nahi chal raha hai na export pe chal raha hai kuch.
Customer: Ek ek do do piece ki gandi lead aa rahi hai wo bhi otherwise dusre product ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha accha.
Executive: Thik hai sir ek baar mai check karwata hu. Bhumika se aapki baat hoti hai sir ya nahi?
Customer: Na meri baat nahi hoti hai abhi.
Executive: Accha thik hai thik hai to mai aapki meeting arrange karata hu Monday ko hai na sir.
Customer: Monday ko to sir fir pure hafte ka mera package 10 by lead mili thi export ki ek consume nahi ho payi hai sir koi product dhang ka mila hi nahi jo jisse baat kare.
Executive: Accha accha ab mai kehta hu sir package bhi itna mahanga hai ab bataiye sir nuksan hi ho raha hai.
Executive: Accha thik hai to fir ispe decision lete hai sir fir to Monday ko hi kyuki Saturday Sunday to off rehta hai na sir office me yaha pe IndiaMART me.
Customer: Sir isiliye maine Sunday se pehle aapko call kari hai pure hafte me aap hi nahi meri to ye bol rahe the ki thoda wait karo sahi ho jayega ab sir wait karne me pura package nikal jayega.
Executive: Sahi baat hai product line sir ek baar batayenge mujhe kya product abhi aap sell kar rahe ho?
Customer: Iron folding bed hai apna manufacturing hai.
Executive: Accha accha.
Customer: Ji iron folding bed ka thik hai thik hai chaliye mai ek baar check karke abhi call karta hu aapko hai na.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Dekhiye sir jaisa bhi hai sort out kariye aap bahut nuksan ho jayega hamara isme.
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul itna mahanga package liya aapne sare apni labour wagaira bhi arrange karaiye wo bhi sab banwaiye labour upar godam badhaya kuch leke sir aapko sab aisi ka aisi hai jab kaam hi nahi milega sir to nuksan hi nuksan hai fir.
Executive: Ji ji nahi nahi bilkul ispe action lete hai sir.
Customer: Iska dekhte hai alag ho jayega fir.
Executive: Sir ispe decision making to sir Monday hi ho payega.
Customer: Bataiye sir pure hafte me samajhiye ek lead consume nahi ho payi hai koi customer barabar nahi mila do hafte ho gaye mujhe ek mahina khatam hone wala hai 15 din 16 din ho gaye mujhe.
Executive: Accha accha thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai ek baar dekhte hai sir ispe.
Customer: Thik hai sir baat kariye sir aap thik hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji bilkul bilkul thik hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads on IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with export package performance.

- Unable to consume any leads.

- Facing losses due to lack of business.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive offered to arrange a meeting on Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, export package, refund, resolution
